knimeNode.name: FSK DB View
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node visualizes FSK models as a HTML Table.

fullDescription.intro:
This node visualizes FSK models as a HTML Table. The source of this metadata can be read from remote repository which can be set via the "Repository URL" option in the setting window. Also this metadata can be provided as KNIME table via the input port.
Example Workflow
fullDescription.option: Sets the maximum number of models, can be selected
set to true if you like to show the download button in each row in the HTML table.
set to true if you like to show the Details button in each row in the HTML table. which opens a modal to show more details about the the current FSK model.
set to true if you like to show the execute button in each row in the HTML table. the model then will be executed on the remote server.
set to true if you like to show the header button in each row in the HTML table.

knimeNode.interactiveView: JavaScript view to visualize FSK models as a HTML Table.
